tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (JJ Last) (NN day)) (ADVP (IN off) (PP (IN until) (NP (NP (CD five) (NNS days)) (PP (RB straight) (IN of) (NP (NN work)))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [day/NN amod>Last/JJ dep>[off/IN nmod:until>[days/NNS case>until/IN nummod>five/CD nmod:of>[work/NN advmod>straight/RB case>of/IN]]] punct>./.]
